verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are all, big and small, beautiful.
How wonderful to trust in grace through faith,
But I'm asking to taste.

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
For dark is light to You,
Depths are height to You,
Far is near, but, Lord, I need to hear from You.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Be near, O God.
Be near, O God of us.
Your nearness is to us our good.
Be near, O God.
Be near, O God of us.
Your nearness is to us our good,
Our good.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Your fullness is mine, revelation divine.
But, oh to taste, to know more than a page,
To feel Your embrace.
